## Type of Change

- [ ] Fix (typo, broken link, factual error)
- [ ] Improvement (clarity, examples, reorganization)
- [ ] New content (new page or section)
- [ ] Screenshot/media update
- [ ] Other

## Checklist

- [ ] I have tested my changes locally with `npm run dev`
- [ ] Pages render correctly and links work
- [ ] Content follows the [style guide](CONTRIBUTING.md#style-guide)
- [ ] New pages are added to the relevant `_meta.ts` file
- [ ] Screenshots (if any) are in `public/screenshots/` with descriptive names
